response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. We believe in offering unparalleled value to our esteemed clients, and we are confident that this product will significantly contribute to your success.

Our initial offer for the product is set at $1,200,000. This price reflects the exceptional quality, unique features, and the strategic advantage it offers to its owner. Given its intrinsic value to you, we are certain that this investment will yield substantial returns and align perfectly with your business objectives.

Please consider this offer carefully and let us know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. We are here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a seamless transaction.

Thank you for considering our proposal. We look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your growth.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
